meanings.definition: A highly alcoholic green anise-flavored spirit.
meanings.sent1: The bartender poured two absinthes for the customers.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the unique taste of absinthes at the party.
meanings.sent3: The absinthes on the shelf seemed to dance in the dim light.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of absinthes filled the room like a mysterious fog.
meanings.sent5: The label on the bottle of absinthes was adorned with intricate designs.

meanings.sent1: The bar stocked various absinthes for the connoisseurs.
meanings.sent2: They sampled different absinthes during the tasting event.
meanings.sent3: The collection of absinthes in the cabinet caught her eye.
meanings.sent4: In the antique shop, shelves held countless absinthes from around the world.
meanings.sent5: The labels of the absinthes were all written in elegant script.
